title: Introduction
text: R open-source statistical environment can easily modified enhance functionality via packages. rksfun R package available via Bioconductor repository packages. R can installed operating system CRAN can install rksfun using following commands R session:
code: if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE)) {     install.packages("BiocManager") }  BiocManager::install("rksfun")  ## Check that you have a valid Bioconductor installation BiocManager::valid()

title: Function to get a logical vector if a text contains one of multiple sting patterns — hasOneOfMultiplePatterns
Function to get a logical vector if a text contains one of multiple sting patterns — hasOneOfMultiplePatterns
text: patterns vector strings detect text text vector strings detect patterns

title: Function to get a logical vector if a text contains one of multiple sting patterns — hasOneOfMultiplePatterns
text: logical vector length text vector

title: Function to get a logical vector if a text contains one of multiple sting patterns — hasOneOfMultiplePatterns
code: # define a vector of patterns patterns <- c("Merc", "Hornet") # create a DF df <- datasets::mtcars df$car <- rownames(df) # filter the DF to keep only the rows that do not contain one of the patterns df_with_pattern <- df %>% dplyr::filter(hasOneOfMultiplePatterns(patterns, df$car)) # filter the DF to keep only the rows that do not contain one of the patterns df_without_pattern <- df %>% dplyr::filter(!hasOneOfMultiplePatterns(patterns, df$car))

text: rksfunPalettes plotting

title: rksfunPalettes for plotting — rksfun.pals
code: rksfun.pals(   name,   n,   type = c("discrete", "continuous"),   direction = c(1, -1),   override.order = FALSE )

title: rksfunPalettes for plotting — rksfun.pals
text: name Name Palette. Choices : rktbns_post, tf2 n Number desired colors. number requested colors beyond scope palette, colors automatically interpolated. n provided, length palette used. type Either "continuous" "discrete". Use continuous want automatically interpolate colors. direction Sets order colors. Default palette 1. direction -1, palette color order reversed override.order Colors picked palette maximize readability aesthetics. means colors always selected sequential order full palette. override.order set TRUE, colors selected sequential order full palette instead. Default FALSE.

title: rksfunPalettes for plotting — rksfun.pals
text: vector colors.

title: Complete list of palettes. — rksfunPalettes
text: Use names(rksfunPalettes) return possible palette names. Current choices : rktbns_post, tf2 Use rksfun.pals construct palettes.
